description: This source file implements the advanced interface functions for the Sys Info Repository Object, including folder and record management operations such as adding, deleting, opening, closing, querying, generating, populating, and enumerating folders and records within a system repository. It also handles access control, notifications, and internal synchronization mechanisms.

classes.name: PSYS_INFO_REPOSITORY_OBJECT
classes.description: Represents the System Info Repository Object, managing access, folders, records, and synchronization.

classes.name: PSYS_RFO_KEY
classes.description: Represents a key to a repository folder, including permissions and folder reference.

classes.name: PSYS_REPOSITORY_FOLDER_OBJECT
classes.description: Represents a folder containing subfolders and records within the repository.

classes.name: PSYS_REPOSITORY_RECORD_OBJECT
classes.description: Represents a record within a folder, containing data and metadata.

classes.name: PSYS_REPOSITORY_DRIVER_OBJECT
classes.description: Driver interface for folder management operations such as add, delete, get.

classes.name: PSYS_RAM_INTERFACE
classes.description: Interface for notifying the system about repository events and possibly other memory operations.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroIraAcqWriteAccess(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Acquire write access to the repository, locking necessary resources.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroIraRelWriteAccess(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Release previously acquired write access to the repository.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysIroIraAddSysFolder(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * pFolderName)
methods.description: Create a new system folder with a specified name.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysIroIraAddFolder(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pSubFolderName)
methods.description: Create a subfolder under a current folder.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysIroIraAddFolder2(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pSubFolderName,ULONG ulPermission,ULONG ulAccessMode,ULONG ulFolderType,ANSC_HANDLE hRenderAttr,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved)
methods.description: Create a folder with detailed permissions and attributes.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroIraDelFolder(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pSubFolderName,BOOL bRecursive)
methods.description: Delete a specified folder, optionally recursively.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroIraDelFolder2(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pSubFolderName,BOOL bRecursive,BOOL bForceful)
methods.description: Delete a folder with permission checks and force option.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysIroIraOpenFolder(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pSubFolderName)
methods.description: Open a subfolder for access.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysIroIraOpenFolder2(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pSubFolderName,ULONG ulAccessMode)
methods.description: Open a folder with specified access mode.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroIraCloseFolder(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder)
methods.description: Close a folder handle, clearing its key.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroIraClearFolder(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder)
methods.description: Clear contents of a folder.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroIraGenerateFolder(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder)
methods.description: Generate or refresh the content of a folder.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroIraPopulateFolder(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder)
methods.description: Populate folder content, possibly with default or dynamic data.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroIraQueryFolder(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,PULONG pulTimestamp,PULONG pulPermission,PULONG pulFolderType,PULONG pulSubFolderCount,PULONG pulRecordCount,PULONG pulContentType,PANSC_HANDLE phRenderAttr)
methods.description: Query folder metadata and attributes.

methods.name: ULONG SysIroIraGetSubFolderCount(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder)
methods.description: Return the count of subfolders.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroIraEnumSubFolder(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,ULONG ulIndex,char * pSubFolderName,PULONG pulNameSize)
methods.description: Enumerate subfolders by index.

methods.name: BOOL SysIroIraTestSubFolder(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pSubFolderName,ULONG ulAccessMode)
methods.description: Test access permission for a subfolder.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroIraAddRecord(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pRecordName,ULONG ulRecordType,PVOID pWriteBuffer,ULONG ulWriteSize)
methods.description: Add a record to a folder.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroIraAddRecord2(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pRecordName,ULONG ulPermission,ULONG ulRecordType,ANSC_HANDLE hRenderAttr,PVOID pWriteBuffer,ULONG ulWriteSize)
methods.description: Add a record with more detailed attributes.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroIraDelRecord(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pRecordName)
methods.description: Delete a record by name.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroIraGetRecord(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pRecordName,PULONG pulRecordType,PANSC_HANDLE phRenderAttr,PVOID pReadBuffer,PULONG pulReadSize)
methods.description: Retrieve a record's data and metadata.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroIraSetRecord(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pRecordName,ULONG ulRecordType,ANSC_HANDLE hRenderAttr,PVOID pWriteBuffer,ULONG ulWriteSize)
methods.description: Configure or update a record's properties.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroIraQueryRecord(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pRecordName,PULONG pulTimestamp,PULONG pulPermission,PULONG pulRecordType,PULONG pulRecordSize,PULONG pulContentType,PANSC_HANDLE phRenderAttr)
methods.description: Query detailed information about a specific record.

methods.name: ULONG SysIroIraGetRecordCount(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder)
methods.description: Get the number of records in a folder.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroIraEnumRecord(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,ULONG ulIndex,char * pRecordName,PULONG pulNameSize,PULONG pulRecordType,PULONG pulDataSize)
methods.description: Enumerate records by index.

methods.name: BOOL SysIroIraTestRecord(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,char * pRecordName,ULONG ulAccessMode)
methods.description: Test access permissions for a record.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroIraSetRfoFolderType(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,ULONG ulFolderType)

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroIraSetRfoRenderAttr(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCurFolder,ANSC_HANDLE hRenderAttr)
